sections.content:
Question:
What is the maximum operating temperature?
Answer:
RA2 series supports wide range of operating temperature.
RA2L1, RA2E1, RA2E3 and RA2A2 support from -40 to 105degC. (ambient temperature)
RA2E2 supports from -40 to 125degC. (ambient temperature)
Suitable Products
RA2L1, RA2E1, RA2E2, RA2E3, RA2A2
